sentences.sContent: Go through your files and look for letters of commendation, awards, etc. you earned in your industry.
sentences.sContent_eng: Go through your files and look for letters of commendation, awards, etc. you earned in your industry.
sentences.sCn: 检查你所有的个人文件，寻找在你的行业中所获得的推荐信，奖励等等。

words.tran: 值得赞美的；很好的；可推荐的

trans.tranOther: an official statement praising someone, especially someone who has been brave or very successful
